description: A partially flooded urban area where an entire district fell into underground waterways. Combines drowning hazards, underwater exploration, and survivor community.

flooded_plaza.name: Flooded Plaza
flooded_plaza.description: Entry point from Nexus. Ankle-deep on raised edges, deeper where old market stalls stood. Buildings rise from the flood like islands.

survivor_camp.name: Survivor Camp
survivor_camp.description: Higher ground where survivors have established a makeshift camp. A lean-to shelters a small fire.
traits: crude map scratched on flat stone
smell of smoke and damp clothes

flooded_chambers.name: Flooded Chambers
flooded_chambers.description: What was once a grand guildhall, now partially submerged. Pillars rise from chest-deep murky water.
flooded_chambers.notes: First encounter with predatory fish. They watch but don't attack in shallows.

tidal_passage.name: Tidal Passage
tidal_passage.description: A twenty-foot underwater passage connecting the chambers to the sea caves. The skill gate for reaching Garrett.

skill_requirements.no_swimming: High drowning risk, fish attack likely, severe damage
skill_requirements.basic_swimming: Passable but slow (2 turns), fish attack once during crossing
skill_requirements.advanced_swimming: Safe passage (1 turn), can avoid fish

sea_caves.name: Sea Caves
sea_caves.description: Natural cavern incorporated into old storage tunnels. Rock shelves and collapsed stonework create islands of dry ground.
sea_caves.notes: Garrett is trapped here on a debris island, water rising around him.

merchant_quarter.name: Merchant Quarter
merchant_quarter.description: Lower district where water runs deep. Must swim more than walk. Buildings rise like canyon walls.
traits: faint rhythmic tapping from somewhere south
merchant_quarter.notes: Route to Delvan. Requires swimming. Tapping sound leads player to warehouse.

merchant_warehouse.name: Merchant Warehouse
merchant_warehouse.description: Large building with ground floor completely flooded. Delvan is trapped on second floor.

ground_floor.notes: Completely flooded. Must find hatch to wine cellar.

wine_cellar.notes: Air pocket at ceiling. Route up to private office.

navigation_challenge.entry: Dive through flooded ground floor, find hatch near stairs
navigation_challenge.cellar: Navigate through wine cellar to narrow staircase
navigation_challenge.requires: Basic swimming minimum, 3 turns breath for full navigation

traits: cargo crates floating like ghosts inside

deep_archive.name: Deep Archive
deep_archive.description: A vast sealed chamber that survived the flood. Repository of knowledge, guarded by the Archivist's spirit.
deep_archive.notes: Water pearl requires completing knowledge quest for Archivist.

camp_leader_mira.name: Camp Leader Mira
camp_leader_mira.description: A middle-aged woman with tired eyes but iron determination. She manages the survivors.

transitions.friendly->allied: Player rescues both survivors OR camp morale high
transitions.any->disappointed: Player lets survivor die without trying

rescue_garrett.description: A sailor is trapped in the caves. He was looking for supplies.
rescue_garrett.reward: Access to Jek's advanced swimming lessons

rescue_delvan.description: The merchant Delvan hasn't returned from his supply run.

camp.summary: Mira gestures at the ragged platforms. 'We're what's left. When the waters rose, most didn't make it. We survive by scavenging and hoping.'

help.summary: Mira's eyes sharpen. 'Two people are missing. Garrett went diving for supplies and hasn't come back. Delvan the merchant was checking his old warehouse.'

garrett.summary: 'The sailor. Good man, reckless. He swims better than anyone but he's been gone too long. The underwater caves to the east.'

delvan.summary: 'A trader who refused to abandon his goods. Went north through the canals to his barge. That was two days ago.'

old_swimmer_jek.name: Old Swimmer Jek
old_swimmer_jek.description: An elderly man with weathered skin and webbed fingers - a birth defect that made him legendary.

teach_swimming_basic.effect: Breath holds extended to 15, swim speed normal, can traverse chest-deep water without penalty

teach_swimming_advanced.requires: Garrett rescued AND Garrett recovered (5 turns after rescue)
teach_swimming_advanced.teacher: Garrett (Jek is too old for advanced techniques)
teach_swimming_advanced.effect: Breath holds extended to 20, can navigate currents safely, can avoid fish attacks

swimming.summary: 'The water isn't your enemy, it's your element if you know how to move with it. I can teach you. For a price, or for a favor.'

price.summary: 'Five gold for the basics. Or bring me something to eat - real food, not this waterlogged garbage.'

favor.summary: 'Find Garrett. He was my apprentice before he got too bold. Bring him back and I'll teach you everything I know for free.'

child_survivor.name: Child Survivor
child_survivor.description: A young child clutching a sodden doll. They watch everything with wide eyes.

doll.summary: The child hugs the doll tighter. 'She keeps me safe. The water tried to take her but I held on.'

scared.summary: The child looks up. 'The library lady is still down there. She clicks and hums. I think she's lonely.'

hint_dialog.about_archivist: Provides hint about Waterlogged Archivist being approachable

sailor_garrett.name: Sailor Garrett
sailor_garrett.description: A young man with tattooed arms, currently drowning. His eyes show terror.

transitions.stabilized->rescued: Led to surface OR exhaustion cured and swims out

option_1.effect: Breath restored, stabilized. Still exhausted, needs help swimming out.

option_2.effect: Can swim but still drowning. Needs to reach surface fast.

option_3.requires: Player has swimming skill OR exceptional strength

effects: Can become companion with diving expertise

treasure.summary: 'I found something down there before I got trapped. A merchant's cache, sealed tight. I can show you where if you want to dive for it.'

the_archivist.name: The Archivist
the_archivist.description: A spectral figure in scholar's robes. Not a ghost exactly - more an echo, like in the Nexus. An elderly woman who stayed to protect the collection.

properties.cannot_leave: The Archivist is bound to the Deep Archive. If she could leave, she would gather the lost knowledge herself.
properties.narrative_justification: She stayed when the waters rose, sealed herself in with the most precious texts. Her form persists through will and the archive's magic.

transitions.guardian->helpful: Player demonstrates scholarly interest (dialog, brings book)
transitions.helpful->allied: Player completes knowledge quest (brings 3+ lost secrets)

information.provides: Information about the disaster, regions, history

enchanted_bubble.provides: Bubble that allows breathing in flooded areas

water_pearl.notes: The pearl was placed here for safekeeping. Archivist will only give it to someone who has proven they value preservation over acquisition.

knowledge_quest.description: Bring me something lost - a truth forgotten, a mystery solved. The district above was full of secrets before the flood. Find ones worth knowing.
knowledge_quest.requirement: Bring 3 out of 5 scattered knowledge fragments from the Sunken District

fragments.content: Trade routes and contacts before the disaster

knowledge_quest.design_note: Some fragments come from rescued NPCs, creating value in those relationships beyond immediate rewards.

identity.summary: 'I am what remains of the Chief Archivist. When the waters rose, I sealed myself in with what I could save. My body is... elsewhere now. But my duty persists.'

disaster.summary: 'The ley lines ruptured. The meridian shattered. In the Sunken District, the underground waterways burst upward. So much was lost in hours.'

water_pearl.summary: 'It was placed here before the disaster - a fragment of the old network, too valuable to risk. I cannot simply give it away. Knowledge must be earned, preservation must be valued.'

knowledge_quest.summary: 'The district above held many secrets. Bring me truths that would otherwise be lost - stories, records, maps. Show me you understand that knowledge is worth preserving. Then we may discuss the pearl.'

merchant_delvan.name: Merchant Delvan
merchant_delvan.description: A portly man pinned under cargo. His face is pale from blood loss.

rescue_requirements.step_2: Free from cargo (use lever OR high strength)
rescue_requirements.step_3: Splint leg or carry to safety

effects: Substantial reward (50 gold, rare items from cargo)
Permanent discount (25%) on all merchant services
Connection to black market contacts in Civilized Remnants

trapped.summary: 'My leg... the cargo shifted when the barge tipped. I can't feel my foot. Please, there's a lever in the hold, you could...'

reward.summary: 'Save me and I'll make it worth your while. My contacts, my goods, my connections - they'll all serve you.'

predatory_fish.name: Predatory Fish
predatory_fish.description: Large fish with visible teeth, grown strange since the disaster. They circle and watch.

behavior.in_shallows: Watch but don't attack. Circle lazily.
behavior.in_deep_water: Dart in to bite, retreat before retaliation. Attack once per passage.
behavior.when_blood_in_water: Become cautious (multiple wounded makes them hesitate, not bold)
behavior.response_to_combat: Fighting in water is heavily penalized (-4 attack, half damage). Fish retreat but return.

damage.multiple_bites_possible: If player very slow or panicking

predatory_fish.design_note: These are obstacles, not enemies. They exist to make water traversal costly without skill, not to provide combat content.

air_bladder.name: air bladder
air_bladder.description: An animal bladder filled with preserved air. Allows breathing underwater temporarily.
air_bladder.effect: Restores breath to full when used. Works in flooded_stacks depth.

waterproof_sack.name: waterproof sack
waterproof_sack.description: An oiled leather bag that keeps contents dry.
waterproof_sack.effect: Items stored within are protected from water damage

water_pearl.name: water pearl
water_pearl.description: A luminescent pearl that glows with inner light. Found in the deep archive.
water_pearl.use: Required for waystone repair in Nexus

ancient_tome.name: ancient tome
ancient_tome.description: A perfectly preserved book in a waterproof case. Its contents describe the pre-disaster world.

lever.name: lever
lever.description: A sturdy iron bar useful for prying.
lever.use: Can free Delvan from cargo, can also clear collapsed canal route

water_bloom.name: water bloom
water_bloom.description: A flower that grows only in the flooded library. Glows faintly blue.
water_bloom.use: Trade item for Bee Queen in Beast Wilds

drowning.recovery: Reach breathable area OR use breathing item

hypothermia.description: Cold water exposure in deep areas
hypothermia.progression: 5 severity per turn in cold water
hypothermia.effects: At 50: slowed movement. At 80: health damage. At 100: incapacitation.

water_levels.ankle: No swimming needed, no breath depletion
water_levels.chest: Movement very slow, no breath depletion

to_nexus.notes: Water does not flood into Nexus (magical barrier)

cross_region_items.water_bloom: To Beast Wilds for bee queen trade

rescued_npc_effects.garrett_rescued: Appears in camp, teaches diving, reveals treasure location
rescued_npc_effects.delvan_rescued: Provides black market contact for Civilized Remnants

swimming_skill.applies_everywhere: Any water area in game benefits from skill

narrative_role.core_tension: Who do you save when you can't save everyone?

garrett.note: Drowning. Physics doesn't care about promises.

delvan.note: Bleeding. Determination can slow blood loss slightly.

dual_rescue_analysis.designed_difficulty: Very difficult on first playthrough, achievable with foreknowledge
dual_rescue_analysis.constraint: Garrett dies in 5 turns from encounter, Delvan in 10-13
dual_rescue_analysis.optimal_path: Learn swimming (1), save Garrett first (5 total), return (8 total), save Delvan (12 total) - barely achievable if Delvan got hope bonus
complications: Player may not know both exist simultaneously
Timers start from first encounter, not from entering region
dual_rescue_analysis.design_intent: First playthrough: player likely saves one or neither. Second playthrough with foreknowledge: can optimize to save both. Creates meaningful replayability.

player_choices_matter: Saving Garrett unlocks advanced swimming (via Garrett teaching, after 5 turn recovery)
Saving Delvan provides economic and black market benefits
Saving both is possible but requires planning and efficiency
Letting either die affects camp morale and available services
Knowledge fragments from rescued NPCs help with Archivist quest

commitment_system.description: Player can make implicit commitments to help NPCs. Commitments create stakes beyond the base deed.

commitment_timer.timer_starts_note: Timer begins when player enters Sea Caves, NOT when commitment made. Garrett is already drowning.
commitment_timer.warning_message: Garrett's head barely breaks the surface. His movements are weakening.

garrett_commitment.note: Physics doesn't care about promises - drowning continues regardless
garrett_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: +2 gratitude (beyond base +4). Garrett shares treasure location immediately.

withdrawal_response.dialog: Garrett's eyes widen in panic, but then... acceptance. 'The cave... east wall... merchant cache... tell Jek...' He points frantically before the current pulls at him.

abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo's form ripples like water. 'He believed you. In his final moments, he waited.'
abandonment_effects.jek_reaction: 'You were there? You SPOKE to him? And you... left?' Old Jek turns away. Advanced swimming lessons unavailable.
abandonment_effects.mira_reaction: Camp Leader Mira: 'I asked you to help. You said you would.' Trust -2, camp morale drops.

delvan_commitment.goal: Free Delvan and stop his bleeding

commitment_timer.timer_starts_note: Timer begins when player first finds Delvan in warehouse.
commitment_timer.warning_message: Delvan's voice is barely a whisper. His skin is grey and cold.

delvan_commitment.note: Hope slows blood loss slightly - determination to survive
delvan_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: +2 gratitude. Delvan offers additional rare item from cargo.

withdrawal_response.dialog: 'Wait... please...' Delvan's voice weakens. 'My lockbox... combination is my daughter's birthday... fourth month, twelfth day... at least take what you can carry...'

abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo speaks softly. 'He offered you everything for his life. You took nothing and gave nothing.'
abandonment_effects.mira_reaction: Camp morale drops. 'He had family waiting. Did you even try?'

both_commitment_special.note: If player promises both but can only save one:
both_commitment_special.scenario: Player commits to both, saves Garrett, Delvan dies
both_commitment_special.effect: Garrett grateful but camp morale still damaged. Echo: 'You kept one word. The other was drowned by circumstance. Intention matters, but so do results.'
both_commitment_special.partial_penalty: Reduced abandonment penalty (-1 instead of -2) if clearly tried

effects.in_water: Wolves refuse to swim in flooded areas. Stay on dry ground.
effects.in_camp: Camp survivors nervous but tolerant if player vouches

benefits.combat: +15 damage against fish, if combat occurs on land/shallow water
benefits.intimidation: Some aggressive fish avoid wolf-accompanied player

waiting_behavior.when_player_swims: Wolves wait at last dry location
waiting_behavior.return: Rejoin when player returns to dry ground

effects.at_boundary: Salamander refuses at flooded plaza entrance. Steam rises from its body as humidity increases.

dialog.refusal: The salamander backs away from the water, making distressed chirping sounds. Its flame dims in the humid air.
dialog.insistence: If player insists, salamander shakes its head firmly and points back toward Nexus. It will NOT enter.

death_scenario.if_player_forces_somehow: Salamander extinguishes in deep water. Dies within 2 turns of submersion.
death_scenario.consequences: Permanent companion loss. Echo comments on senseless death.

sira_specific.without_swimming: Stays in camp. 'I can't swim. I'll wait here.'
sira_specific.with_basic_swimming: Can accompany to shallow areas only

aldric_specific.too_weak: Cannot handle water hazards at all. Stays in camp.
aldric_specific.dialog: 'The flooded areas... I studied them before. But I can't... not anymore. Be careful.'

waiting_behavior.description: When companion cannot or won't enter water areas
waiting_behavior.wolves_wait_at: Survivor Camp or Flooded Plaza edge (dry ground)
waiting_behavior.return_behavior: Non-salamander companions rejoin at waiting location. Salamander requires player to return to Nexus.

resolved_questions.question: Can player save both Garrett and Delvan in one playthrough?
resolved_questions.resolution: Yes, but designed to be very difficult on first playthrough. Requires foreknowledge, efficiency, and accepting resource costs. See dual_rescue_analysis in narrative_role. Aligns with design goal: most regions take 2+ playthroughs to succeed with all challenges.

resolved_questions.question: What treasure does Garrett reveal?
resolved_questions.resolution: A merchant's cache in a side cave off the sea caves. Contains gold, potions, and becomes one of the knowledge fragments for the Archivist's quest (maps of underwater passages).

resolved_questions.question: How difficult should the deep archive be to access?
resolved_questions.resolution: Requires advanced swimming (30-foot underwater entrance) OR Archivist's enchanted bubble. Water pearl additionally requires completing knowledge quest (bring 3 of 5 scattered knowledge fragments). Creates multi-step content that rewards thorough exploration.

resolved_questions.question: How much time does training take?
resolved_questions.resolution: Basic swimming: 1 turn. Advanced swimming: 2 turns, and requires Garrett to recover first (5 turns after rescue). This matters for dual rescue timing.

resolved_questions.question: How does player learn Delvan's survival status before committing?
resolved_questions.resolution: Must investigate in person. Camp has no way to check remotely. Tapping sound from warehouse provides audio clue that someone is alive.

resolved_questions.question: What happens if player gets water pearl without helping anyone?
resolved_questions.resolution: Valid 'cold efficiency' path. Player can reach archive with advanced swimming (requires saving Garrett first for lessons, creating minimum engagement) or by finding/buying enchanted bubble elsewhere. But knowledge quest requires some interaction with district NPCs. Pure efficiency is possible but yields less overall value.

resolved_questions.question: Are there other knowledge fragments beyond the five listed?
resolved_questions.resolution: Five is sufficient. The fragment list is designed so some come from rescued NPCs (creating value in those relationships) and some from exploration. Player needs 3 of 5, allowing for partial completion of rescue goals.
